RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 1 6F Dirt CR: 79. Starter Allowance Purse 20000. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR FILLIES AND MARES FOUR YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $5,000 OR LESS SINCE JANUARY 25, 2022. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since December 25 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since November 25 Allow ed 4 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $5,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SIMPLE SOUVENIR was settled three wide early, advanced two wide on the turn, angled out for racing room at the furlong marker, made a bid to get up late to prove best, driving. SOUTH HOUSE stalked the early pace and made a four wide bid leaving the quarter pole, hit the front leaving the furlong marker but was caught late, good effort. ROSES FROM HEAVEN was settled early on the inside, angled out leaving the furlong marker and was up for the show award. KATY THE CAT was settled back early, came five wide into the lane, shifted out to the far outside and had a belated rally. HAY NINETEEN was settled early between rivals, came four wide into the lane and had no rally. MELODIOUS SINGER vied for the vied for the lead on the inside, made a bid to shake clear on the turn but weakened the final furlong. SICK PACK SARA vied for the early lead three wide and faltered in the lane.

ENTRY.NAME: Roses From Heaven
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle inside, angled out 1/8, got show

ENTRY.NAME: Katy the Cat
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled back, came 5 wide, angled out, belatedly

ENTRY.NAME: Melodious Singer
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied inside, bid turn, shook clear, weakened 1/8

ENTRY.NAME: Sick Pack Sara
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead 3 wide, faltered

ENTRY.NAME: Hay Nineteen
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled between horses, came 4 wide, no rally,

ENTRY.NAME: Simple Souvenir
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled 3 wide, advanced 2 wide turn, angled out 1/8, bid,up late

ENTRY.NAME: South House
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace 4 wide, bid 4 wide, led 1/16, caught, good effort

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 84. Starter Optional Claiming Purse 19000. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $16,000 OR LESS AND WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $16,000 AND WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Sinc e December 25 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since November 25 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $16,000 (Races Where Entered For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ROMANTIC GAMBLE was well placed early towards the inside, made a bid leaving the turn and was between rivals leaving the three sixteenths, then vied for command by the furlong marker and prevailed late after a long drive. GANDI stalked the pace and made a four wide bid leaving the turn, then was outfinished late by the winner, good effiort. SPOOKY ONE set the pace on the inside and faded the final furlong. KEFI was settled early, advanced two to three wide on the turn and lacked the needed stretch bid. MAGIC SPIN chased the pace on the inside and had no rally. ECLIPTICALS BEAR tracked the pace five wide and weakened. MIZZEN MONEY chased the pace three wide and weakened. BOX OF JOE showed little.

ENTRY.NAME: Spooky One
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace inside, faded 1/8

ENTRY.NAME: Magic Spin
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, inside turn, no rally,

ENTRY.NAME: Romantic Gamble
ENTRY.COMMENT: well placed, bid between upper, long drive, prevailed late

ENTRY.NAME: Mizzen Money
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace 3 wide, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Gandi
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace 4 wide, bid 4 wide, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Eclipticals Bear
ENTRY.OWNER: Short Straw Stable and Haire Maria Montez
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace 5 wide, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Kefi
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, advanced 3 wide turn, needed stretch bid

ENTRY.NAME: Box of Joe
ENTRY.OWNER: AB Racing LLC and Crown Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: showed little,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 3 1M 70Y Dirt CR: 80. Claiming Purse 13100. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE JULY 25. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since December 25 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $6,250, if for $6,000, allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Ent ered For $5,000 Or Less Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DEVOTED KITTEN was reserved early, advanced three to four wide on the turn , continued to make that bid and hit the front leaving the sixteenth marker and then held on late to prevail under a drive. SHANGHAI CANDY was settled back early, came five wide into the lane and closed well but was too late. I LOVE JAXSON stalked the early pace four wide, made a three wide bid on the turn and was clear by the furlong marker but faded late. VITESSE was allowed to settle early, came wide into the lane while dropping out, then had a belated rally on the outside for the minor rewards. SPIN CYCLE was well placed early and then went up to vie for command on the inside then weakened in the lane. MINE TO HOLD set the early pace and then vied for the lead two wide, then was between horses by the quarter pole and weakened.

ENTRY.NAME: Spin Cycle
ENTRY.COMMENT: well placed inside, vied inside, weakened stretch,

ENTRY.NAME: Devoted Kitten
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved early, advanced 3 wide turn, came 4 wide, bid, prevailed

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Kenneth L. Ramsey & Sarah K. Ramsey

ENTRY.NAME: Mine to Hold
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace 2 wide, vied 2 wide, between 1/4, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: I Love Jaxson
ENTRY.OWNER: Kasey K Racing Stable LLC Englehart Jeffrey S and Final Turn Racing Stable LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace 4 wide, bid 3 wide, clear 1/8, late fade

ENTRY.NAME: Vitesse
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, came wide upper stretch, belatedly outside

ENTRY.NAME: Shanghai Candy
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled back, came 5 wide upper stretch, closed, too late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 65. Claiming Purse 19000. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Weight, 122 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since December 25 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $25,000, if for $22,500, allowed 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: UPSTATE AND BACK was allowed to settle early, advanced on the inside on the turn, then slipped through leaving the turn and drew clear in the final furlong to prove best, driving. NEON SIGN dueled for the lead inside of a rival, then made a bid to draw clear on the turn in the two path, then was headed leaving the turn by the winner and proved to be no match for that rival, second best. BRENTFORD was rated along three wide, then made a mild bid four wide on the turn but had no late kick, bested rest. TIEMPO PERFECTO was reserved three wide, then angled out by the sixteenth marker and improved position late. BRODY'S WAR was allowed to settle on the inside and had no rally. LORD UHTRED dueled for the lead three wide, then stalked the pace three wide by the quarter pole and came up empty.

ENTRY.NAME: Tiempo Perfecto
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved 3 wide, angled out 1/16, improved

ENTRY.NAME: Brody's War
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, inside turn, no rally,

ENTRY.NAME: Upstate and Back
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, inside move, drew clear, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Neon Sign
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled inside, bid 2 wide turn, clear 1/4, no match late,2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Brentford
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated early 3 wide, 4 wide 1/4 pole, no kick, bested rest

ENTRY.NAME: Lord Uhtred
ENTRY.OWNER: Kernan Jr Morris E Johnson Troy and Jagger Inc
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled 3 wide, stalked pace 3 wide 1/4, empty,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 73. Claiming Purse 11800. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR FILLIES AND MARES FOUR YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE JULY 25 OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since December 25 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since November 25 Allowed 4 l bs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Races Where Entered For $4,000 Or Less Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CHEROKEE PARTY was allowed to settle early, advanced on the inside on the turn, angled off the inside leaving the quarter pole, made a four wide bid and split rivals leaving the turn, then drew clear to prove best, driving. HELLO GRACIE was allowed to settle early, advanced three wide on the turn and then shifted to the inside by the quarter pole, made a inside bid leaving the turn and got the place award. ONE TOUGH ROSE vied for the early lead and then made a bid to shake clear on the turn while three wide, then was headed leaving the turn and faded, bested rest. JET FORCE vied for the early lead inside, then shifted out on the turn and was four wide by the quarter pole and was empty. SWEET BLINDNESS broke in a tangle at the start, advanced three wide on the turn and came four wide into the lane and finished with some late interest. GLOSSY MADRINA lacked a rally. MOSCOWS GOT TALENT failed to menace. SPECIAL FREEDOM was rank at the start and was far back.

ENTRY.NAME: Moscows Got Talent
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Hello Gracie
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, 3 wide turn, bid inside, got 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Sweet Blindness
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke in tangle, advanced 3 wide turn, came 4 wide, no rally,

ENTRY.NAME: Cherokee Party
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, inside turn, angled 1/4, split upper, clear,

ENTRY.NAME: Glossy Madrina
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved, lacked rally

ENTRY.NAME: Special Freedom
ENTRY.COMMENT: rank start, showed little,

ENTRY.NAME: Jet Force
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied inside, shifted out turn, bid 4 wide 1/4, came 5 wide, empty

ENTRY.NAME: One Tough Rose
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied 3 wide, shook clear turn 3 wide, , faded stretch,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 74. Maiden Special Weight Purse 27100. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD. Weight, 122 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TERMSOFENGAGEMENT was well placed along the inside, angled out leaving the three sixteenths for aim on the front runner, then closed well to get up in time, driving. HIGH STRIKE set the pace while in the two path, drew clear leaving the turn and was clear by the furlong marker but was caught late to be denied. ROCK ANNA ROLL stalked the pace three wide and weakened, bested rest. DON'T QUESTION ME lacked a solid rally. RECKLESS JONES failed to menace. SHARP STYLE was not a factor. GREATEST WARRIOR was off slowly and raced far back.

ENTRY.NAME: Greatest Warrior
ENTRY.OWNER: Bates Elizabeth and Stites William P
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slowly, far back, showed little

ENTRY.NAME: Termsofengagement
ENTRY.OWNER: Parthemore Jeffrey W and Spinazzola Anthony
ENTRY.COMMENT: well placed inside, angled out stretch, closed, up in time,

ENTRY.NAME: Don't Question Me
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, lacked rally

ENTRY.NAME: Sharp Style
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Reckless Jones
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved early, failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Rock Anna Roll
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace 3 wide, weakened, bested rest

ENTRY.NAME: High Strike
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace 2 wide, drew clear upper stretch, denied late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 7 1M 70Y Dirt CR: 64. Maiden Claiming Purse 13600. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES FOUR YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Weight, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CRIMSON LILLE was well placed early on the inside, made a inside bid to duel for command on the turn, then drew clear nearing the furlong marker and kicked away to prove best, driving. MS KAYS COWGIRL was reserved early, advanced on the inside on the turn and then had a late rally to gain the place award. HUSHEMUP set the pace while racing off the rail, then dueled for the lead three wide on the turn and weakened the final furlong, lost place late, bested rest. SKIPOVER was reserved early, advanced two wide on the turn and came three wide into the lane and had no rally. CEETA chased the pace four wide and tired. LET UR LIGHT SHINE was void of early speed and wide on the backstretch and was not a threat. DREAMERS BELONG tracked the pace and was three to four wide on the backstretch and stopped.

ENTRY.NAME: Let Ur Light Shine
ENTRY.COMMENT: void early speed, wide backstretch, no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: Dreamers Belong
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace, 3-4 wide backstretch, stopped

ENTRY.NAME: Ms Kays Cowgirl
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved early, inside turn, late rally, got place

ENTRY.NAME: Crimson Lille
ENTRY.COMMENT: well placed inside, bid inside, dueled 1/4, drew clear, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Skipover
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved early, 2 wide turn, came 3 wide, no rally,

ENTRY.NAME: Hushemup
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace off rail, dueled 3 wide turn, weakened, lost 2nd late

ENTRY.NAME: Ceeta
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace 4 wide, tired
